text: (nabiye!) obage ratin obava pitamam kala ayata vada kopamanado ratavæsiyan itamat saktivantayin vasayen sitiyaha. (ovun kala aparadhayanhi hetuven) ovunva api vinasa kara dæmuvemu. (e avasthavedi) ovunta udav karannan kisivekut sitiye næta. (ebævin movun mona mullakatada! movunvada api anivaryayenma vinasa kara damannemu)
